com.bitmazk.libgdx_utils - package com.bitmazk.libgdx_utils
This package shall hold useful helper classes for game development with libGDX.

PlatformerInputController - Class in com.bitmazk.libgdx_utils
Processes user input and renders HUD with controller buttons on the screen.
